criteria: 100% pass rate on malicious sandbox unit tests (TASK-401-04); 85% unit test coverage for new backend services; Security review of sandbox and audit designs complete.
success_metrics: Zero critical security findings in sandbox; Audit log design meets compliance requirements.

gate_name: Sprint 2 Quality Gate: Interactive UI & Encryption
criteria: All E2E tests for script preview and validation are passing; Integration test for encryption at rest (TASK-403-04) is passing; Preview API meets 15s timeout requirement.
success_metrics: No regressions in UI; Encryption is verified; Timeout is enforced.

criteria: All E2E tests for full script lifecycle (create, edit, version, revert) are passing; Prometheus /metrics endpoint is validated and populating correctly; No performance regressions from versioning feature.
bypass_criteria: Minor UI issues can be deferred with new tickets.
success_metrics: All user stories for the epic are met; System is ready for user acceptance testing (UAT).
